item.title: Creating "Cloud" Workspace at Home
item.description: In the age of services such as Amazon Workspaces,and V2 Cloud Workspaces, amung many others, I feel obligated it point out that virtual “cloud” workspaces can be easily setup and created at home, using Linux. While these services provide the obvious advantage of being hosted and maintained in a large data-center, if you don’t need that… roll your own. I’ll show you how.
